title: JUST COME TO SAY THANKS
body: Just come to say thanks riot, for giving me 1-3 trolls every URF game because they didnt get to play the champ they want, including myself, yes, when i get a champ i dont want i troll with the rest of my team, why, because we think it is stupid that you bring out urf, the game mode everyone likes, but yet we cant play the champs we want to play, Thanks you.

replies.body: Awww didums did mummy and daddy say no to you?

on about kid, iv been looking after myself since 12, now 21 and i bet iv accomplished more then you, your father, your fathers father and your grandfathers father. if you are gona try be a smart ass at least get smart about the topic i am talking about. bet you are still in you're mothers basement.
I very much doubt you have accomplished much. Considering you are acting like a spoilt child about a temp game mode.
